[SYNTAX]: Complex sentence structures may impede smooth reading (e.g., long descriptive sentences)

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transition between historical context and strategic plans (e.g., from "Strategically..." to "Union Movements" list)
[CLARITY]: Unclear references ("a thing", "stuff") disrupt narrative flow
[LOGIC]: Assumed prior knowledge of certain battles and locations without introduction

[SYNTAX]: Awkward phrasing in "the stuff capital" and similar constructions
[LEXICON]: Overuse of vague terms ("a thing", "the stuff") disrupting flow

[CLARITY]: Overreliance on unspecified terms ("a thing", "the stuff") causing confusion
[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transition from discussing railroads to the Battle of Petersburg without clear connection
